about_the_game:
ABOUT

TIRTA is an action-adventure game set in a fantasy world based on Balinese culture. The game aims to deliver the beauty of Balinese mysticism to the player through its unique aesthetics and a twist on a traditional legend.

In this game, the players control water to manipulate the environment, traverse ancient ruins, and defeat corrupted horrors to restore the flow of rivers and ultimately reunite the Sea with the Mountain.

Game Features :
Water is your best friend

Water is the source of life, and now it’ll be your best support, empowering you with its boundless potential as you navigate through the intricacies of your adventure. Embrace its fluid nature, harness its transformative abilities, and witness how it becomes the cornerstone of your triumphs.

Defeat evil creatures
Your journey won’t be easy, as evil forces will try to stop you at every step. Use your water and surroundings to defeat them!

Unravel the secrets
Across the vast expanse of this world, countless enigmatic puzzles lie scattered, their solutions eluding the grasp of all who encounter them. However, armed with your extraordinary power and boundless imagination, you possess the key to unraveling these mysteries and inching ever closer to reuniting the Sea and the Mountain.

  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 280
